1.title: The Apprenticeship

episode of.title: Hawke: The Larrikin and the Leader (TV Series 2018)

1.plot: This explains how Hawke served his "apprenticeship" as President of the ACTU, and this allowed him to be in touch with the people (at least in his opinion).

2.title: The Prime Ministership

episode of.title: Hawke: The Larrikin and the Leader (TV Series 2018)

2.plot: In March 1983, Hawke won government by a landslide, only a few weeks after Bill Hayden stepped down as ALP leader in Hawke's favour and defeating then Australian second-longest serving Prime Minister Malcolm Fraser.

imdb.plot outline: Australians have never been so wary of politicians. But there was a time when things were different. From the moment Bob Hawke blazed onto the national stage, he was the rock god of Australian politics. So what made this flawed man a leader we'd never forget? This two-part political biography takes a revelatory look at the times and leadership that made us who we are today.
imdb.title: Hawke: The Larrikin and the Leader
akas: Hawke: The Larrikin and the Leader (Australia)
